Articles.Content: when i first start a career game all the buildings are fine, tier 1 and whatnot but after i run a mission all the building are "Upgraded" to maximum but inside the buildings they are still the initial tier 1 restrictions. i have about 99 mods installed on a 64x version of ksp and am using ckan to install most of them. i'd provide a mod list but i'm not sure how to make one with ckan.
